arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim’s final throw of the dice at Man Utd with big changes predicted vs Sunderland
arts.athr: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Ben Husband, Felix Keith, Dan Marsh)
arts.sum: Manchester United host Sunderland at Old Trafford later today, with under-fire manager Ruben Amorim desperate for a positive result to quieten speculation over his future

arts.ttl: Score Predictions: Can Sunderland Take Points at Old Trafford?
arts.sum: Martin Wanless predicts… Score prediction: Man Utd 1 Sunderland 2 Sunderland’s first goalscorer: Le Fee If in late May you’d shown me this prediction, I’d have questioned my future sanity and requested the men in white coats visit immediately, but I honestly feel as if we have a real chance of getting all three points […]

arts.ttl: Starting XI: Is this the Sunderland team to take on Manchester United today?
arts.sum: The lads go to Old Trafford this afternoon off the back of an excellent win at Nottingham Forest last time out – and Regis Le Bris has a few selection options as he looks to seize the opportunity to add to our already impressive points tally. Last week Arthur Masuaku replaced the suspended Reinildo – and […]

arts.ttl: Man Utd vs. Sunderland: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Pressure continues to grow on Ruben Amorim after last weekend’s disaster at Brentford.

arts.ttl: Amorim under 'acute pressure' as Man Utd boss faces sack risk in Sunderland clash
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim is reportedly facing a sack risk in Saturday's Premier League clash with Sunderland at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim on the brink: Sir Jim Ratcliffe's mood has changed while Man Utd stars have lost faith in stubborn manager's system - and defeat by Sunderland could push board to breaking point
arts.sum: CHRIS WHEELER: The 40-year-old is under huge pressure as he prepares to face Sunderland at Old Trafford on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim Sack Verdict Delivered Ahead of ‘Big’ Sunderland Game
arts.sum: The Red Devils are enduring their worst start to a Premier League season in history.

arts.ttl: Six players could miss Man Utd vs Sunderland clash including World Cup winner
arts.sum: Manchester United host Sunderland in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon in what looks set to be a pivotal clash for under-pressure Ruben Amorim

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Man United vs Sunderland
arts.sum: Pressure is mounting on manager Ruben Amorim, especially after United’s disappointing 3-1 defeat away to Brentford in their last Premier League outing. Manchester United host newly promoted Sunderland at Old Trafford in what is being billed as a must-win fixture for the Red Devils.

arts.ttl: Laurie Whitwell Shares Surprise Amorim Sack Update Ahead of Man Utd v Sunderland
arts.sum: The Athletic's Laurie Whitwell reports that Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim will keep his job even if the team loses to Sunderland.
